extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the serial numbers present on the machine for iWork 09.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.apple.iWork09.plist" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.iWork09 ProductivitySFLLicense` fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
